subject: Golf
British Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Sergio García, who shot a 66 on Sunday to finish at 15 under par at the British Open, could feel triumphant despite his two-shot defeat to Rory McIlroy.
snippet: Sergio García, who shot a 66 on Sunday to finish at 15 under par at the British Open, could feel triumphant despite his two-shot defeat to Rory McIlroy.
